thread.title: 56th floor - brilliant!
thread.title_full: 56th floor - brilliant! - Review of Hyatt Centric Times Square New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: travelbyRosie
title: 56th floor - brilliant!
text:
We chose this hotel for convenience - it was the location of the NYE party we were going to and it was close to all the broadway theatres & transport. What we didn't count on was the 56th floor room we had and the brilliant view of Manhattan - very special!
The room was spacious, well decked out and very comfortable for our nine night stay. Hotel restaurant facilities are fairly basic but there is so much to choose from close by that this is not an issue. No issues with service though you'd expect some greetings during an extended stay.. That said .. the price point is much cheaper than a Grand Hyatt or Park Hyatt so you can't expect the same service..
Great location, comfortable hotel and very good value for money.
